<h3>Schedule of Approved Holidays for UIC Fiscal Year 2019</h3>
<p><strong><em>GROUP A:&nbsp;&nbsp;Applies to all staff members except those listed under Group B</em>:
</strong><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;"></span></p>
<br>
<table>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <th><span style="text-decoration: underline;">HOLIDAY</span></th>
            <th><span style="text-decoration: underline;">DAY OBSERVED</span></th>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Independence Day Holiday</td>
            <td>Wednesday, July 4, 2018</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Labor Day Holiday</td>
